name: Aice Cream
description:
Programming & Game Design : Isaac Simmons

Art & Game Design : Terri Simmons

This is our first husband and wife game jam! It was a fun experience.

Isaac is a video games developer at a AAA Games Company

Terri is not in the industry at all however she likes doing art as a hobby!

This game was made in about under 15 hours so lacks things like a menu, however it was a fun rush to do it in a limited time.
